argumentText:
ARGUMENT
a

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lssacs.b | |- B = ( Base ` W ) |
| 2 |  | lssacs.s | |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_lssss | |- ( a e. S -> a C_ B ) |
| 4 |  | #P_selpw | |- ( a e. ~P B <-> a C_ B ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_sylibr | |- ( a e. S -> a e. ~P B ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_a1i | |- ( W e. LMod -> ( a e. S -> a e. ~P B ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_ssrdv | |- ( W e. LMod -> S C_ ~P B ) |
| 8 | 1, 2 | #P_lss1 | |- ( W e. LMod -> B e. S ) |
| 9 | 2 | #P_lssintcl | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ a C_ S /\ a =/= (/) ) -> |^| a e. S ) |
| 10 | 7, 8, 9 | #P_ismred | |- ( W e. LMod -> S e. ( Moore ` B ) ) |
